thread.title: Wall Street rallies after wild market ride

title: Wall Street rallies after wild market ride
text:
Wild ride as Wall Street tries to end slump 1:34pm EST - 01:52 
U.S. stocks swung sharply between gains and losses Tuesday as Wall Street tried to end a plunge that began last week in the U.S. and extended Tuesday around the globe. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
